individualName.surName: Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin-Dahlem

address.deliveryPoint: Botanisches Museum Berlin-Dahlem, Königin-Luise-Str. 6-8, 14195 Berlin, Germany

abstract.para: The "Herbarium Lusaticum" represents the flora of Upper Lusatia with 47,000 specimens of vascular plants collected over a period of 200 years. About 45,000 specimens of the "Herbarium Lusaticum" are digitised in the collection database.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

address.deliveryPoint: Senckenberg Museum für Naturkunde Görlitz, Postfach 300 154, 02806 Görlitz, Deutschland

gbif.citation: Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin. Herbarium Senckenbergianum Görlitz (GLM). Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/1cvts9 accessed via GBIF.org on 2022-02-08.
